snippet: Five people died and at least one was wounded when a police convoy came under attack on Wednesday in the volatile southern Russian republic of Ingushetia.
abstract: Five people die and at least one person is wounded when a police convoy comes under attack in the volatile southern Russian republic of Ingushetia; bombing comes after several weeks of increased violence in the North Caucasus region.
lead_paragraph: Five people died and at least one was wounded when a police convoy came under attack on Wednesday in the volatile southern Russian republic of Ingushetia.

headline.seo: Police Convoy Is Attacked in a Russian Republic
headline.main: Russia: Police Convoy Is Attacked in Restive Ingushetia
headline.print_headline: Russia: Police Convoy Is Attacked in Restive Ingushetia
